page.title: 08DAYS GONE BY
page.content: no fun going outside on a cold night.In the fifties there were some-times more than ten in a family. The children went to church many times a week,three times on a Sunday,twice during the week and then Sunday school. This was about normal for the children. Most children liked school and most walked to it each day. Every-one wore school uniform and if they did'nt wear it they got the cane. When any child did something wrong they got two to four strokes of the cane. No-one ever told their parents because they then got the slipper for doing something wrong in the first place. After school all the children used to play in the street. They had to make up their own games, for there were no televisions and few radios.
